articles.title: Middle East airspace shut after Israel strikes Iran, airlines cancel flights - Reuters
'I thought I would die': Sole survivor from Air India plane crash speaks out - ABC News
articles.summary: 'I thought I would die': Sole survivor from Air India plane crash speaks out "Everything happened in front of my eyes," Vishwaskumar Ramesh said. Investigation after hundreds killed in Air India plane crash An urgent investigation is underway to determine how an Air India jet carrying 230 passengers and 12 crew crashed just after takeoff, killing everyone but one person...

articles.title: North Korea claims warship launch successful on second try - BBC
articles.summary: North Korea claims warship launch successful on second try Pyongyang says it has successfully relaunched its new warship North Korea says it has successfully relaunched its new 5,000-ton naval destroyer, less than a month after it capsized during the first attempted launch, state media reports. The country's leader, Kim Jong Un, had reacted furiously to the warship's failed launch in...
